title: Why cant i enter the game with the new client!!!
body: I downloaded the beta for the new client. I watched a video with it and it looked cool. So i downloaded the beta and.....I press play i wait.And waited. And waited. I need help. I NEED MY LEAGUE!!!!

replies.body: I'm not sure about the issue that you're having.  Can you provide some more details on the issue?

EDITORS NOTE: 
Before , "I NEED HELP." I meant to type, "it didn't work."
